entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Include implicit `MyBase.New()` calls in VB Constructors #64354
    C# 12.0
  • Code lens don't work for source-generated files #64348
  • Report warning for unannotated parameters that could be marked `scoped` #64344
    C# 12.0
  • Improve Source Link navigation for simple async methods #64336

Closed

  • [release/7.0.1xx] roslyn + linker looks for net6.0 nupkgs #64200
  • static interface methods not emitted when interface marked ComImport #64238
    17.4
  • After upgrading "Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp" from 4.2.0 to 4.30 generator errors #64323

PullRequests

Created

  • Capture UIntPtr binary operator resolution break #64353
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • Initialize service on already opened documents #64352
    Area-IDE
  • Produce a dedicated, index-based, api for unit testing to find the source location of test methods. #64351
    Area-IDE
  • Remove feature flag #64350
    Area-IDE
  • Fix DecodeForwardIteratorRecord to accept strings w/o null terminator #64349
    Area-Interactive
  • Inline Hints - Make sure hints aren't returned after code has been deleted #64341
    Area-IDE
  • Better handle methods in partial classes that don't have sequence points #64337
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Wait until solution is fully loaded until scanning for designer attributes. #64340
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix C# completion list tag completion provider #64347
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #64269
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove 'file open/close' eventing from the new unit-testing solutioncrawler #64339
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid dropping Razor SDK source generator when not included in VSIX #64345
    Area-IDE, Interactive-EnC
  • Remove code that thinks it needs to close a document before removing #64232
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix test to use await using after clasp merge #64346
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add distinct feature attribute for tracking unit testing solution crawler #64343
    Area-IDE
  • Remove portions of SolutionCrawler not used by UnitTesting team. #64330
    Area-IDE
  • Use AdditionalFilterTexts in enum member completion #64261
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64342
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge features/CLaSP into main #64282
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64338
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Avoid invoking remote EnC service for documents that do not support remote workspace #64302
    Interactive-EnC
  • Disallow methods with bodies in ComImport interfaces. #64257
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64335
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Skip the stackoverflow test because it's not stable enough #64329
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Fix additional file diagnostics when in a multi-targeting project #64309
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next

Updated

  • Out as return only #64318
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64358
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Always bind implicit constructor initializers for explicit constructors #64331
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64357
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64356
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Avoid writing `CDATA` to generated targets file #64334
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix the stack overflow in AbstractEmbeddedLanguageClassificationService.cs #64311
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2006676 #64310
  • TextLoader method override detection #64192
    Area-IDE
  • Allow TS to derive from the more performant internal API #64258
    Area-IDE
  • Remove LangVer check on using a native int operator #64325
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int, 17.5
  • Remove TextDocumentState.sourceText #64231
    Area-IDE
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE
  • Remove exportProvider parameter from TestWorkspace ctor #64221
    Area-IDE
  • Make remaining managed pointer type scenarios warnings #64294
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, 17.4
  • Use the source-built version of ref packs and don't use app host when building in source-build #64055
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow rename for symbols that are both defined in user code and generated #64332
    Area-IDE
  • Ban api #62921
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Change ForAttributeWithMetadataName to use an explicit stack when recursing #64322
    Area-Compilers
  • Add a new Location.Create overload for external file location with a different mappedLineSpan #64240
    Area-Analyzers
